about_the_game:
RACE CODE is a new generation racing game that will revive your old feelings. It will offer the opportunity to compete on maps at almost the exact scale in the real world. This is not an open world game, but there are roads almost the size of an open world game. You will find yourself on roads that are fun and exciting to drive around the world. In addition, day and night and changing weather conditions, specially designed shortcuts will add more pleasure. You will find many iconic cars from Asia, Europe and America in the game. As it is an early access game, commitments will be fulfilled over time. The game will be developed in line with the ideas and demands of you, the users, by creating a large community. Community requests will be surveyed, appropriate requests will be made.

The racing models currently available in the game is Sprint , Circuit, Time trial and Career Race. With the achievements you make in career mode, you canbuy new roads and cars. During this time the game will be played offline. In Future Free roaming, traffic, multiplayer modes and other features will be added to the system. In addition in next update the races you win or lose will change the status of your profile, so you can find tough opponents in multiplayer mode.

Moreover, you can play the game with simulation or realistic physics engine that is easy to drive. You can enhance your driving experience by turning the driving assist features on or off.

We Will Give You the Taste Of Old Racing Games!


With the v1.1 update, Xbox, Playstation controller and steering wheel are now integrated into the system.

Circuit races and time trial events have been integrated into the system, now you can take on challenges in career mode. Start the challenge in career mode and earn your money.

A total of 23 races with 17 new races, a total of 22 cars with 17 new cars have been integrated into the system, now a more filled and fun game is waiting for you.

With the new update, the game now has the AMD FidelityFX™ Super Resolution (FSR) system. Regardless of your graphics card, you can increase your fsp values with the FSR system.

You can adjust the car's driving assistance systems


You can adjust your car's driving support systems in Difficulty Setting. In this way, you can make your car either drift or handling.

Experience the joy of smashing objects


Many objects that you can smash during the race are included in the game
